text: The 1901 Nevada State Sagebrushers football team was an American football team that represented Nevada State University (now known as the University of Nevada, Reno) as an independent during the 1901 college football season. In its first season under head coach Allen Steckle, the team compiled a 3–3 record. ==Previous season== The Sagebrushers finished the 1900 season 4–2–1. Head coach James Hopper was replaced by Allen Steckle. ==Schedule== ==References== Nevada State Category:Nevada Wolf Pack football seasons Nevada State Sagebrushers football
title: 1901 Nevada State Sagebrushers football team
